title: Alaks1
author: Alaks1
content: Hello everyone as mentioned in the title I'm selling a gambling website its cups.ggInformation4 games modeEOS provably fairAdmin PanelRain/Trivia Google/steam sign inVerification systemPlus much more features GamesCrashCoinflip (up to 4 ways)WheelJackpotAdvanced Admin PanelDeposit/Withdraw/ProfitTotal Users with each info about the user (bet placed, code redeemed etc)Race start/end/prize/timeVIP systemBan/Mute/VerifyAccept/Decline withdraw (can be manually or automated)Transaction infoDemo could be provided in dmsThe website backend is well coded and structured and I'm selling it for only $250 (Middle man is accepted for both of our safety)If you are interested add me on discord alaks1

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: Quote from: Alaks1 on September 21, 2023, 08:07:37 AMHello everyone as mentioned in the title I'm selling a gambling website its cups.ggI'm a little bit confused you're selling a gambling website but the domain you provided is not a demo of a gambling site but rather a domain that is for sale for QuotePay the full USD $19,800QuoteDemo could be provided in dmsThe website backend is well coded and structured and I'm selling it for only $250 (Middle man is accepted for both of our safety)If you are interested add me on discord alaks1It is better to load a screenshot of the backend and front end, I hope you're not another seller who just extracted a code from another developer do you have documentation for this and a proof of ownership of the source code?
